articles.title: Is nature adapting to climate change? Underwater coral reefs in the Pacific that were predicted to vanish by 2 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Data predicts the world's coral reefs could disappear by 2050 due to climate change, but a small area around a Pacific island has adapted to rising ocean temperatures.
articles.content:
Coral reefs are dying worldwide due to the warming waters of climate change, but one chain of coral in the Pacific Ocean is experiencing a bounce back.
